testcase.name: Authentication › should display login page with all elements

Authentication › should navigate to signup page when clicking signup link
Authentication › should display signup page with registration form

Authentication › should redirect from protected workspace route
Authentication › should persist authentication across page refreshes
Authentication › should disable submit button while form is submitting
Authentication › should handle network errors gracefully

Authentication › should clear authentication token on logout
Authentication › should show loading indicator while authenticating
Authentication - Error Handling › should show error for network timeout
Authentication - Error Handling › should focus on email field when it has an error

Multi-Tenant Isolation - Team Member Access › should allow team member to access team workspaces

Multi-Tenant Isolation - Permission Levels › should respect phase assignments for team members
